seniorPastor.name: John Miller
seniorPastor.bio: Founder and Senior Pastor with over 20 years of ministry experience. Passionate about expository teaching and discipleship.

associatePastor.name: Sarah Chen
associatePastor.title: Associate Pastor, Community Outreach
associatePastor.bio: Leads outreach initiatives with a heart for the marginalized and vision for reconciliation.

worshipDirector.name: Michael Torres
worshipDirector.title: Worship & Arts Director
worshipDirector.bio: Creates transformative worship experiences that connect people with God.

mission: To know Jesus more deeply and help others do the same through worship, community, and service.
vision: To see lives transformed by the Gospel of Jesus Christ and communities restored to wholeness and purpose.
beliefs: The Bible is God's inspired, authoritative word
Salvation comes through faith in Jesus Christ
The Holy Spirit empowers believers for transformation
Community is essential to the Christian life
Service to the poor and marginalized is a call
Christ's return and establishment of His kingdom
